newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia to stop expanding regional T-bill network.
newsitem.headline: Russia to stop expanding regional T-bill network.

text.p: VLADIVOSTOK, Russia, Sept 3 (Reuter ) - Russia's central bank will not further expand the regional network for trading government securities, a senior central banker said on Tuesday.
"The set-up of regional trade floors is solving the problem of capital flow from the regions to Moscow," deputy chairman Andrei Kozlov told a banking conference.
Outside Moscow, there are government securities trading floors in St Petersburg, Yekaterinburg, Nizhny Novgorod, Vladivostok, Novosibirsk, Rostov-on-Don and Samara.
Kozlov said the share of the regional centres in trading government securities had risen to six percent from four percent a month ago.
